title: Looking for friendly people to play with unranked
body:
Hey, I'm looking for friendly people to play with unranked. I never rage at anyone especially if they're having a bad day or bad game (would prefer to help them instead), and don't care much about winning (winning is nice of course but whatever). It's fine if we lose if the match itself was good i.e. we gave each other a run for the money.

Im pretty bad and haven't played in a while. I had an account on NA but missed the free transfer so I guess would be playing on a new account here. It would be nice to get better, but it's not important if the game itself is fun. I only really play Bruiser types (the most fun class for me I guess?)

Anyone with a similar mindset interested in playing with me? Also I don't mind at all people trying weird builds or strategies or anything, it actually makes things more fun I think.

replies.body: Hey there, I'm a newish League player looking for friendly people to play with too so feel free to send me a friend request. :)
I'm keen as a bean :D I shall add you
Hello! First off welcome to oceania! Don't hesistate to add me [Kingx] without the "[ ]". I don't really care about winning,to me what important is that we all have fun :P
Welcome to OCE! Feel free to add me or my lvl 3 smurf~! I can play pretty much any role but probs best in the jungle. Also, i love doing whacky build in normals.

I'm always open to new friends
Add me: viperblits

Silver 4 Jungle main. Super friendly. Player very frequently. I have skype :)

hey, im interested in playing, cept im not a frequent player (about 2 games on the weekends SOMETIMES) and have lots of lag spikes.
i main support, cant adc and can kinda do the other roles. I wouldnt mind playing ranked or norms (or aram :D)

add me ;)
